properties.areaDesc: White, IN; Carroll, IN; Pulaski, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 9:19PM EST until January 16 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Flood Warning for the following rivers...

Tippecanoe River above Winamac affecting Carroll...Pulaski and White
Counties

.Runoff along the Tippecanoe River has allowed a rise towards minor
flood threshold at the Winamac location.

The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Tippecanoe River above Winamac
* until Thursday afternoon.
* At 9 PM Tuesday the stage was 10.0 feet and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise to near flood stage around
1 AM Wednesday January 15.
* At 10.0 feet...The river is at flood stage. Some residences begin
to be affected by flood water and the Winamac town park floods.
properties.instruction:
Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep
to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood
waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further
statements and updated forecasts.

Detailed river forecasts and more information can be found on the
internet at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.

All times are in Eastern Time. This statement will be updated in
about 24 hours or sooner if necessary.
